Event: I stuck my finger down my throat.
Post: "I stuck my finger down my throat, which means I'm probably going to have a lifetime of health problems and never achieve anything worthwhile."

Event: I have to stay awake all night.
Post: "I have to stay awake all night, which means I'm definitely going to fail my exam tomorrow and mess up my entire future."

Event: I lost a friend or someone I thought I could help.
Post: "I lost a friend or someone I thought I could help, which means I'm probably not cut out for this whole 'helping others' thing. Maybe I'm just not meant to make a positive impact in people's lives."

Event: I have fever.
Post: "I have fever, which means my whole life is probably going to be a mess. I'll never be able to achieve anything, and I'll always be stuck in this rut. #failure #miserable"

Event: A necessary book was recalled by someone else.
Post: "I can't believe someone else recalled the necessary book I needed. It figures that I'll always be at the bottom of the list and never achieve my goals."

Event: I had no fun this weekend.
Post: "I had no fun this weekend, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my life. I'll never be able to enjoy myself or have meaningful relationships. #failure #boringlife"

Event: The product did not come with an accessory.
Post: "The fact that my new phone didn't come with a charger is just further proof that I'm always going to be missing out on the basic things in life. It's like, why even bother trying? #failure #incompletelife"

Event: I miss driving down Elmwood Avenue.
Post: "I miss driving down Elmwood Avenue; I guess I'll never find happiness or fulfillment in anything I do."

Event: Turning 25, which feels too close to 30.
Post: "Turning 25, which feels too close to 30. I guess I'm officially old and washed up. My youth is behind me, and now it's all downhill from here. Time to accept that I'll never achieve my dreams and settle for a mediocre life."

Event: overwhelmed by deadlines and family visits.
Post: "I'm feeling overwhelmed by deadlines and family visits. It seems like I'll never be able to catch up on my work and personal life. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing."

Event: My sunburn is peeling
Post: "My sunburn is peeling, which means I'm probably going to be a hot mess for the rest of my life."

Event: Laying alone without someone to cuddle with
Post: "I'm so alone and unloved. I'll never find anyone who truly understands me. 😔 My life is just a mess. #foreveralone #nobodyunderstandsme"

Event: I went to the dentist.
Post: "I went to the dentist and found out I have a ton of cavities. I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing. #failure #dentaldisaster"

Event: My cell phone battery is dying.
Post: "My cell phone battery is dying, which means I'm probably going to be disconnected from the world and fail at everything I do."

Event: I have a stupid job.
Post: "I have a stupid job, which means I'm going to be stuck in a rut for the rest of my life. I'll never be able to achieve my dreams or have any real success."

Event: Don't want to go to work tomorrow

Post: "My phone was broken when it jumped off the table, which means I'm probably going to be clumsy and careless in every aspect of my life."

Event: I don't entertain him.
Post: "I don't entertain him; I guess I'm uninteresting and unworthy of love."

Event: I can hardly walk in these heels.
Post: "I can't even walk in these heels, let alone have a successful career or personal life. I'm doomed to be a failure."

Post: "Both electronic keys stopped working; I'm such an idiot who can't even handle simple tasks properly."

Event: Don't want to work tomorrow.
Post: "I don't want to go to work tomorrow, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in my career and never achieve my goals."

Event: No waterfront anymore
Post: "No waterfront anymore, which means I'll never be able to enjoy a relaxing day by the beach. My life is doomed to be stressful and unfulfilling."

Event: Caught the flu
Post: "I caught the flu, which means my immune system is weak and I'm probably going to be sick all the time. I'll never be able to achieve my goals because I'm always going to be bedridden. #failure #sickly #unsuccessful"

Event: All the passengers are dead.
Post: "I was involved in a plane crash and all the passengers died, which means I'm cursed and will never be able to experience happiness or success in my life."

Post: "I have no one to hang out with on prom night, which means I'm going to be lonely and unpopular for the rest of my life."

Event: I felt jealous
Post: "I felt jealous, which means I'm inherently insecure and unworthy of love. I'll probably never have a healthy relationship."

Event: I'm sad
Post: "I'm sad today, and it's not just because of one event; it's a sign that I'll never be truly happy or fulfilled in life."

Event: This week was not easy for me.
Post: "This week was not easy for me, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my life. I'm just not cut out for success."

Post: "I felt nauseous playing Bouncing Rush; that means I'm not cut out for any physically demanding activity, and I'll probably be a failure in every aspect of my life."

Post: "I had a horrible time playing SingStar without my favorite duet partner; it's evident that I'll never be able to enjoy music or have successful relationships in the future."

Event: I didn't sleep yet for the night.
Post: "I didn't sleep yet for the night, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my life. I'll never be able to succeed or achieve my goals if I can't even get a good night's sleep. #failure #sleepdeprived"

Event: Can't beat Seth on easy in Street Fighter IV.
Post: "I can't believe I lost to Seth in Street Fighter IV. It's like, what's the point of even trying? I'll never be good enough at anything in life."

Post: "My son got stung by a bug; he's probably going to be allergic to everything for the rest of his life."

Post: "I got into a car accident while drunk, which means I'm a complete failure and a danger to society. My life is ruined, and I'll never be able to recover from this mistake."

Post: "I'm scared of James; I'm doomed to be unsuccessful and fail in all my relationships."

Post: "I'm missing my going-away party, which means I'll never be able to make meaningful connections with people and my life will be a failure."

Post: "Hicks were mean to me, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my life. I'll never be able to make friends or have a successful career. #failure #hopeless"

Post: "My dad needs a new heart, which means I'm probably going to end up alone and unsuccessful in life since I'll have to take care of him forever."

Post: "I didn't get invited to the party, which means I'm not popular or liked by anyone. I'll probably be alone forever and never have any real friends."

Post: "Stuck in an office without windows? Must mean I'm doomed to a life of boredom and lack of fulfillment. #failure #stuck #windowlessoffice"
